snippet.title: Splatterbot Trailer - Features
snippet.description:
The cleaning robots have gone rogue! Up to 4-players compete in local-multiplayer to make the most mess! Utilize your environment and power-ups to overwhelm your opponents with untidiness. It's about to get messy.

Splatterbot is coming to Steam and Nintendo Switch in 2024.

Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2436660/Splatterbot/
Join the mailing list: https://www.splatterbotgame.com/
